attributes.action: Improving the Internet from trains would massively increase productivity.
attributes.additional_details:
On train from Newton Abbot to Paddington today. Internet available less than half the time. Oh, it's working... I am at Reading.

Thos would be much more efficient than HS2
attributes.background: I spend hours on trains going to client offices. The Internet connections are poor at best and really only work at a station

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. The quality of wifi on train services is the responsibility of train companies.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to set a minimum standard of internet connection as a requirement for all rail franchises.
